tbl_writingtools_flags.title: Grammar can be improved
tbl_writingtools_flags.description: The grammar of this section makes it very difficult to follow. There is a lot of opportunity to improve the grammer, and therefore ensure that you convey the meaning that you intend from the text.

tbl_writingtools_flags.title: This section needs references
tbl_writingtools_flags.description: There is a lot of information in this section that would be improved by the citation of relevant references.
